full_description:
Crelander Knight LED Motorcycle Riding Backpack

The Crelander Knight LED Motorcycle Riding Backpack is designed with a focus on both functionality and style. The backpack features a durable and waterproof 3D hardcore material, ensuring its longevity. The backpack is equipped with a 48*48 full-color dot matrix screen that supports various formats such as text, pictures, and GIFs. The adjustable shoulder strap size and breathable back material provide maximum comfort during travel, hiking, and other activities. To use the backpack, simply search for the "LOY eye" app on your mobile phone or scan the provided QR code to download it. Connect the built-in USB data port to a mobile power supply, turn on Bluetooth, and scan the QR code to bind the backpack to your device. The back width is made of 1680pvc material and can accommodate portable rechargeable power supplies. The backpack offers ample space, measuring 15 x 7 x 18 inches in size. It includes a large zipper pocket suitable for a tablet computer and multiple independent small compartments for organizing cosmetics, keys, textbooks, cell phones, and more. The DIY screen on the backpack allows for customization. The Crelander Knight LED Motorcycle Riding Backpack is an essential companion for outdoor enthusiasts, particularly riders. It incorporates advanced features like early warning alerts, significantly improving safety during night rides.
